resources.string: Wellcome to your smart water reminder
Here comes a few simple questions before we can personalize your daily goal and schedule
The daily water intake needs of people of different ages vary
Your gender will help us recommend amore accurate daily water intake goal for you
THe daily water intake for people of different weights varies greatly
How much exercise do you do each week
The daily water intake needs of people with different exercise amount vary
When do you usually wake up?
Getting hydrated right after waking up will give you energy in the morning!
We\'ll remind you to drink 1 hour before and 1 hour after meals for better digestion and weight loss
